search_results.snippet: Pravda. Pravda (Russian: ; IPA: [pravd] ( listen), "Truth") is a Russian broadsheet newspaper, formerly the official newspaper of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, when it was one of the most influential papers in the country with a circulation of 11 million.
